# invalidEntitlement

**Type Property**

Occurs when the app lacks the required entitlement.

## Declaration

```swift
static var invalidEntitlement: SRError.Code { get }
```

## Discussion

To allow the app to read sensor data, the system requires that the app’s code signature contain a special entitlement. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/configuring-your-project-for-sensor-reading].

## Identifying an Error Cause

- **promptDeclined**: Occurs when the user cancels the sensor approval workflow.
- **dataInaccessible**: Occurs when the app can’t access the sensor’s data.
- **fetchRequestInvalid**: Occurs when the app misconfigures a fetch request.
- **noAuthorization**: Occurs when the user declines sensor access in the Settings app.
